title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 March 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:12 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
00:28 <abusenius> has quit  
02:05 <jvelo> has quit  
02:28 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki

05:04 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
05:29 <jvdrean> has quit  
07:53 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <DrLou\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <DrLou> has quit  
09:20 <DrLou\_\_> is now known as <DrLou>  
10:56 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
13:54 <jvelo> has quit  
14:17 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
14:25 <tekzilla> has quit  
14:26 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:30 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
14:53 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
18:04 <vishnu> has joined #xwiki  
18:07 <vishnu> Hi everyone!  
18:08 <@sdumitriu> Hi vishnu  
18:09 <vishnu> I am new to XWiki and I would be very happy if I get some help regarding installation XWiki  
18:10 <vishnu> I am student from India and I am very much interested in what your community is doing!  
18:11 <vishnu> And I would be very happy to contribute to XWiki! :)  
18:14 <@sdumitriu> Did you read http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/AdminGuide/Installation#HInstallationMethods ?  
18:17 <vishnu> Thank you sdumitriu! I will read it now!  
18:22 <@sdumitriu> I'd say it's easier to use the standalone distribution at the start  
18:23 <@sdumitriu> It's the quickest way, and it's easier to change things and restart  
18:28 <vishnu> oh! Okay! I was actually thinking of using .war version  
18:28 <vishnu> But I will see standalone first then  
18:34 <vishnu> @sdumitriu, can I change the code and run XWiki again in standalone mode?  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
18:35 <vishnu> oh, ok, thank you!  
19:32 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
19:39 <jvdrean> has quit  
19:40 <vishnu> has quit  
20:54 <rrodriguez> Hi! Sorry for insisting about this, but it would be great to obtaining your feedback on this kind of errors: ERROR store.XWikiHibernateStore      - No data for property author of object id -983978001  
20:54 <rrodriguez> I've set up log4j.logger.com.xpn.xwiki.store.XWikiHibernateStore=fatal to avoid having tones of lines like this...  
20:55 <rrodriguez> but I don't know yet if I'm skipping an important symptom of problems in our farm.  
20:56 <rrodriguez> Please, could anybody advice me on this? Please, what is the origin of this error message?  
20:56 <rrodriguez> Thanks!  
20:56 <vmassol> rrodriguez: sorry I don't have the time but I would recommend searching on google and on the xwiki mailing list archive  
20:57 <rrodriguez> vmassol: thanks for your answer! I've look around for a while and reached no conclusion yet. I'll keep trying!  
20:57 <rrodriguez> thanks  
21:06 <vmassol> has quit  
21:14 <jvelo> has quit  
22:48 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
23:02 <jvelo> has quit  
23:05 <abusenius> has quit  
23:06 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki
